entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH IN EFFECT, Saint-Nicéphore
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Low 19.
entry.summary: Showers or thunderstorms. Risk of a severe thunderstorm this evening and overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. Temperature falling to 15 in the afternoon.
